title: Ticket #3656: Basic START operation
description:
job_basic_start_test.run

We are testing that we can configure one slot to only run a particular job type. This job has +RequiresTypeB in it's submit file. We run another job without it which should run on any of the remaining slots. slot 5 is the special slot in this case.
